SELECT certification_no AS C_CERTIFICATION_NO, user_no AS C_USER_NO, certificate_no AS C_CERTIFICATE_NO, certificate_name AS C_CERTIFICATE_NAME, issuing_org AS C_ISSUING_ORG, acquired_date AS C_ACQUIRED_DATE, notes AS C_NOTES FROM tb_certification WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
